name: @tacc/core-styles
author: TACC ACI WMA <wma-portals@gmail.com>
description: CSS source and processor for TACC Core-CMS and Core-Portal.

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:demo
scripts.test: bin/test.js && echo "Test output at 'dist/_tests' (compare to test input)"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build # && npm test && npm run lint

// peerDependencies.node-cmd: To run PostCSS CLI from script
// peerDependencies.postcss-banner: To prepend preserved comment to built stylesheets
// peerDependencies.postcss-cli: To process CSS (the simplest and cheapest PostCSS runner)
// peerDependencies.postcss-env-function: To inappropriately use env() as build-time var()
// peerDependencies.postcss-import: To import CSS files at build-time
// peerDependencies.postcss-extend: To extend CSS rule sets at build-time
// peerDependencies.postcss-preset-env: To use future CSS features now
// peerDependencies.postcss-replace: To edit relative paths to fonts
// peerDependencies.npm-watch: To live build on source file change
